website_summaries.verdict: Traditional lipstick with built-in primer in numerous eye-catching shades and 3 finishes. One of the most popular lipsticks by the brand.
pros: Creamy lipstick with primer infused inside, so you don't need an additional lip product
Colors pop, as they are deeply pigmented
In addition to numerous beautiful colors, these lipsticks are available in satin, shimmer, and matte finishes
cons: Color tends to pool in find lines on your lips
Fades after several hours of wear, requiring another swipe to keep your look fresh

customer_reviews.title: It’s fake! Not Clinique
customer_reviews.text: Fake Clinique! I don’t know what brand they sent me but it’s clearly not Clinique. The color is cheap and it feels weird on my lips, I had to wash it off. What’s the show on the picture it’s not what they sent.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Menaged

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with the quality of this product. Compared with the same color lipstick that I bought in a Clinique promotion and they are very different. This is pencil width vs normal lipsticks I buy. It is smaller, cheaper quality, raised lettering Clinique name, made in different country and the comment "not for individual sale". The lipstick had tiny pimply bumps all over also. My first thought was that it's a knock off, but when I sent a message to the seller, she says that it isn't. I can't risk my health. I love the color, but I returned it. Waiting to see how much the seller refunds. Will never buy again without physically seeing the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap and Clinique so I thought I would try it. Color is beautiful but it was smaller than I anticipated; smaller than most lipsticks. Plus, it doesn’t stay on very well.
customer_reviews.author: Presley Haskett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect going out lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lipstick after collaborating with a Clinique customer service person through Clinique's website. I wanted to get more into the world of lipstick (after finding a more natural color first) and find a fun going out color that would stand out! This is now my favorite lipstick to use when going out or dressing up for a fancy event! This color is beautiful!! It does a perfect job of amping up my outfit while accentuating my natural skin tone and not being too obnoxious. It's also the perfect combination where it feel hydrating without being sticky or easily smearing off. LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Clinique is the absolute best lip stick. This small size along with a small price helps you try different shades. This size is plenty big to last a while.
customer_reviews.author: joyce wells

customer_reviews.title: Really great Primer”””💕💕💕
customer_reviews.text: Iv re ordered this product twice” It is a Clinick product” It’s a perfect primer” you can put any lip stick over it & it lasts all morning “ It’s a great price” My Estee Lauder lipstick go great together/ w primer.🥰
customer_reviews.author: Charllot Stribling

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick color is nice. Outside tube cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Color of lipstick is very nice. However the lipstick tube is made of cheap product. The outside color portion easily scratches and dents
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected and at a good price
customer_reviews.text: It's a sheer formulation that delivers a hint of color and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Floyd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its not better then any drug store lipstick. Doesn't stay on long at all
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not certain this is by Estee Lauder
customer_reviews.text: Not certain this product is legitimate as being from Estee Lauder. Case seems cheap and lipstick is smaller than standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Fairly intense color
customer_reviews.text: I'd hoped this Pop Up would be more of a gloss. It's OK as a lipstick. It obviously was originally part of a Clinique promo, as the package stated "not for individual sale."
customer_reviews.author: Leonard M Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: For a light lipstick day
customer_reviews.text: First time trying the Clinique. Was recommended by a friend and wanted to try. I love the color but it is not too deep of a color like i would have liked. It is glossy and easy to smear on. It is not my fav but it may be for someone who maybe would like some tint.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color! Unfortunately it has been discontinued by Clinique. I am so happy I found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Marakas

customer_reviews.title: Great color and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love Clinique and loved the color. Small size fits nicely into evening bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary George

customer_reviews.title: Clinique lipstick at bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Good price on Clinique lipstick. It’s usually much more expensive. It’s not “cakey” and it doesn’t have an unpleasant taste. It’s sheer & glossy. I really like the love pop color & i think it would work well with most skin tones.
customer_reviews.author: LikelyOsprey472

product_meta.title: Clinique Pop Lip Colour + Primer - # 13 Love Pop Travel Size 0.08oz / 2.3g
product_meta.description: Size:0.08 OunceLuxurious yet weightless formula merges bold, saturated colour with a smoothing primer. Glides on effortlessly to a modern-velvet finish. Colour stays true, keeps lips comfortably moisturized for 8 hours. Allergy Tested. 100% Fragrance Free.
feature_bullets: Travel size lipstick (0.08 oz.) in silver and matching promotional case
Color stays true, keeps lips comfortably moisturized for 8 hours
Glides on effortlessly for a full coverage satin finish
Clinique's Clean Philosophy: No parabens. No phthalates. No fragrance. Just happy skin. linique's Clean Philosophy: No parabens. No phthalates. No fragrance. Just happy skin.
